lead_paragraph: Texas, by refusing to accept the federal government’s expansion of Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act, would be shunning a pot of money.

headline.main: At a Loss on Refusing Medicaid Cash
headline.print_headline: At a Loss On Refusing Medicaid Cash
headline.seo: Letting Politics Trump Business Sense on Medicaid in Texas

snippet: Texas, by refusing to accept the federal government’s expansion of Medicaid under the Affordable Care Act, would be shunning a pot of money....
